name: Gun Fever
storyline:
A very long time ago, the world experienced a golden age of elaborate technology. But time has done its share of work and the past is nothing but a rusty object laying in the vast deserts which cover the planet. Nevertheless, the past has not vanished into thin air...

For with each decade comes an upsurge in mechanical power, called "the mechanical tidal wave". A wave of destructive machines rises and destroys everything in its path.

So to fight fire with fire, every town has been provided a Ranger, a trigger-happy ace whose shooting zeal will determine the chance of survival for each city dweller...
summary:
A game based on the popular cartoon series named Gun Fever.

The Wild West is covered by a terrible epidemic. Indians, cowboys and settlers are suffering from it. This disease is called "Revolver Fever." Shoot first, or lie in a coffin!

Lots of adventures await you in the role of the character of the game. He came from the cartoon and looks too cheerful for the Wild West. Naturally, bandits and other moral monsters, like the evil sheriffs, do not like it. But you have a true Colt, while your Colt has bullets!
